name: Crescent Quest
description:
Enter the world of Reltionus, exploring the worlds regions as your own character on your own adventure, uncovering many mysteries of the world and other realms. You may get sidetracked with many quests, areas, skills, and customization that will keep you busy. Begin your adventure in the world of Crescent Quest today!

Crescent Quest is inspired by old 2000s MMO designs while still being a unique, single player only experience. There's over 14 skills to gain experience in, 20+ quests to discover, and 10+ Chyfrinx to collect and raise. Feel free to join and mark your name in the history of Crescent Quest and join the ever growing world of Reltionus, including the community for the game!

Crescent Quest will continue to be formed over time and there are many events year-round to be a part of including events for various holidays such as Easter, Halloween, and Christmas. Don't miss out if you are a completionist!

Crescent Quest is powered by RPG Maker VX Ace.
